directions: Stir beans, onion, garlic, oil, lime juice, salt, red pepper flakes, cumin, and black pepper together in a bowl. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate until flavors blend, about 2 hours.
Spread cream cheese onto the bottom of a serving plate. Spoon bean mixture evenly over cream cheese.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
title: Easy Layered Black Bean Dip
